name: SFCertificatePanel
desc: A panel or sheet that displays one or more certificates.

items.name: func certificatePanelShowHelp(SFCertificatePanel!) -> Bool
items.desc: Implements custom help behavior for the modal panel.

items.name: func beginSheet(for: NSWindow!, modalDelegate: Any!, didEnd: Selector!, contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!, certificates: [Any]!, showGroup: Bool)
items.desc: Displays one or more certificates in a modal sheet.

items.name: func beginSheet(for: NSWindow!, modalDelegate: Any!, didEnd: Selector!, contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!, trust: SecTrust!, showGroup: Bool)
items.desc: Displays a certificate chain in a modal sheet.

items.name: func certificateView() -> SFCertificateView!
items.desc: Returns the certificate view for the modal panel.

items.name: func helpAnchor() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the current help anchor string for the sheet or panel.

items.name: func policies() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns an array of policies used to evaluate the status of the displayed certificates.

items.name: func runModal(for: SecTrust!, showGroup: Bool) -> Int
items.desc: Displays a certificate chain in a modal panel.

items.name: func runModal(forCertificates: [Any]!, showGroup: Bool) -> Int
items.desc: Displays one or more specified certificates in a modal panel.

items.name: func setAlternateButtonTitle(String!)
items.desc: Customizes the title of the alternate button.

items.name: func setDefaultButtonTitle(String!)
items.desc: Customizes the title of the default button.

items.name: func setHelpAnchor(String!)
items.desc: Sets the help anchor string for the sheet or modal panel.

items.name: func setPolicies(Any!)
items.desc: Specifies one or more policies that apply to the displayed certificates.

items.name: func setShowsHelp(Bool)
items.desc: Displays a Help button in the sheet or panel.

items.name: func showsHelp() -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the help button is currently set to be displayed.

items.name: class func shared() -> SFCertificatePanel!
items.desc: Returns a fully initialized, singleton certificate panel object.
